overview: Red MILF Productions's first full length feature is XXX parody of the Bollywood hit, The Dirty Picture. Rachel Steele's visit to India with her son Nick takes an unexpected turn. A star struck King Alibaba arranges for their travel documents to be stolen and for her to be cut off from assistance. In return for one night of pleasure, Alibaba guarantees their return home. Wearing a sari, Rachel and her son Nick arrive at the palace to discover that the King has more in mind. The mother, son and King are entwined in a taboo session of incestuous pleasure.
title: The Dirty Movie
